list.name: CARAMELIZE
list.description: Mandy's next candy from her Candy Dispenser slows down enemies on hit for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Mandy's next candy from her Candy Dispenser slows down enemies on hit for x seconds.

list.name: COOKIE-CRUMBS
list.description: Mandy's next candy from her Candy Dispenser pierces enemies and environment.
list.descriptionHtml: Mandy's next candy from her Candy Dispenser pierces enemies and environment.
